name: All in a Day's Work
overview: All In A Day's Work is a detective text adventure. The player takes the role of agent Bogosian. One morning director Pirelli calls you into his office and tells you that Rick Lumberjack has been murdered. Rick is the brother of your old college room mate Harry, he was investigating a drugs cartel run by a guy called Malone. The director gives you and your partner, agent Wauchope, sixteen hours to crack the case and nail Malone. This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard commands such as GET and DROP together with shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West. It also supports more complex commands such as 'ASK WAUCHOPE "DRIVE TO HQ"' The commands INFO and VOCAB provide in-game assistance.
